verses.kjv: And he shewed me Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the LORD, and Satan standing at his right hand to resist him.
verses.web: He showed me Joshua the high priest standing before LORD’s angel, and Satan standing at his right hand to be his adversary.
verses.ct: Then the angel showed me a vision of Joshua the high priest standing before the angel of the LORD. Satan was standing at Joshua's right side, ready to accuse him.

verses.kjv: And the LORD said unto Satan, The LORD rebuke thee, O Satan; even the LORD that hath chosen Jerusalem rebuke thee: is not this a brand plucked out of the fire?
verses.web: LORD said to Satan, “LORD rebuke you, Satan! Yes, LORD who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Isn’t this a burning stick plucked out of the fire?”
verses.ct: The LORD said to Satan, "The LORD rebuke you, Satan! The LORD who has chosen Jerusalem rebukes you! Isn't this man like a burning stick snatched from the fire?"

verses.kjv: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.
verses.web: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and was standing before the angel.
verses.ct: Now Joshua was standing before the angel dressed in filthy clothes.

verses.kjv: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
verses.web: He answered and spoke to those who stood before him, saying, “Take the filthy garments off him.” To him he said, “Behold, I have caused your iniquity to pass from you, and I will clothe you with rich clothing.”
verses.ct: The angel spoke to those standing nearby and said, "Take those filthy clothes off of him." Then he turned to Joshua and said, "Look — I have taken your sin away from you, and I'm going to dress you in fine new clothes."

verses.kjv: And I said, Let them set a fair mitre upon his head. So they set a fair mitre upon his head, and clothed him with garments. And the angel of the LORD stood by.
verses.web: I said, “Let them set a clean turban on his head.” So they set a clean turban on his head, and clothed him; and LORD’s angel was standing by.
verses.ct: Then I spoke up and said, "Put a clean turban on his head too." So they placed a clean turban on his head and dressed him in new garments while the angel of the LORD stood watching.

verses.kjv: And the angel of the LORD protested unto Joshua, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s angel protested to Joshua, saying,
verses.ct: Then the angel of the LORD gave Joshua this solemn charge:

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; If thou wilt walk in my ways, and if thou wilt keep my charge, then thou shalt also judge my house, and shalt also keep my courts, and I will give thee places to walk among these that stand by.
verses.web: “LORD of Armies says: ‘If you will walk in my ways, and if you will follow my instructions, then you also shall judge my house, and shall also keep my courts, and I will give you a place of access among these who stand by.
verses.ct: "This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'If you walk in my ways and carry out my instructions, then you will govern my house and oversee my courts. And I will give you a place among these angels standing here.

verses.kjv: Hear now, O Joshua the high priest, thou, and thy fellows that sit before thee: for they are men wondered at: for, behold, I will bring forth my servant the BRANCH.
verses.web: Hear now, Joshua the high priest, you and your fellows who sit before you; for they are men who are a sign: for, behold, I will bring out my servant, the Branch.
verses.ct: Listen carefully, Joshua the high priest — you and your fellow priests sitting before you. You are all living signs of what's to come, because I am going to bring my servant, the Branch.

verses.kjv: For behold the stone that I have laid before Joshua; upon one stone shall be seven eyes: behold, I will engrave the graving thereof, saith the LORD of hosts, and I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.
verses.web: For, behold, the stone that I have set before Joshua; on one stone are seven eyes: behold, I will engrave its engraving,’ says LORD of Armies, ‘and I will remove the iniquity of that land in one day.
verses.ct: Look at the stone I have placed in front of Joshua — a single stone with 7 eyes on it. I myself will engrave an inscription on it,' declares the LORD of hosts, 'and I will remove the sin of this land in a single day.

verses.kjv: In that day, saith the LORD of hosts, shall ye call every man his neighbour under the vine and under the fig tree.
verses.web: In that day,’ says LORD of Armies, ‘you will invite every man his neighbor under the vine and under the fig tree.’ ”
verses.ct: On that day,' declares the LORD of hosts, 'each of you will invite your neighbor to sit in peace under your vine and under your fig tree.'"
